title: Camellia Plant Gift
Silver Anniversary Camellia Gift
description: Give a gift that blooms with love! Our Camellia Plant Gift is a stunning, long lasting alternative to traditional flowers, symbolising admiration and gratitude. Choose from three beautiful colours; red, pink, or white. Arriving in a 3L pot at a height of 40-60cm, this elegant evergreen plant is beautifully gift-wrapped for a truly special touch. With glossy green leaves and exquisite blooms, the Camellia will bring joy year after year. For an extra thoughtful gesture, add a greetings card at checkout to complete your heartfelt gift.

The stunning Silver Anniversary Camellia makes a real statement to make a Silver wedding. Beautiful yet modest, this stunning gift’s key statement is of 25 years together, with great expectations of the next 25 years. The true beauty lies in the intricate details that make this a fitting gift for a long and happy marriage. A true statement to highlight everlasting love. The perfect gift for a Silver Anniversary holds all the qualities that the marriage holds. The beautiful details of the flowers with the subtle foliage personify any anniversary, the details and differences make this a fitting lasting gift that will bring joy all the way to a Golden Wedding Anniversary. Shimmering silver and glittering gold explode into a colour infusion for this stunning gift. The contrast of emerald green gives a beautiful contradiction of light and dark that will ensnare the mind and inflame the senses. * The Silver Anniversary Camellia Gift is delivered gift wrapped in jute sacking in a 2L pot at a height of approximately 60cm * The Silver Anniversary Camellia produces white coloured flowers * Camellias are an outdoor shrub that produces evergreen dark green glossy leaves * White flowers bloom between November and January each year * Grows to a maximum height of 2.5m / 8.2ft * Perfect colourful plant gift for winter Silver Wedding Anniversary! Image: M Bergmann.
